feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 09:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
